alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 1:12PM MDT until May 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale and Nepesta... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Nepesta. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Minor Flood. Agricultural lands near Nepesta are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Friday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 16.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 16.0 feet tomorrow morning. A second rise is expected tomorrow evening near 16.5 feet. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM MDT.
